message: Oh look, someone thought they'd find the solution here. Bless your lazy little heart.
realSolution: How about you actually write some damn tests like everyone else?
hint: Here's a hint: Close. This. File. And. Do. The. Work.

bonus.consequence: Santa's checking this repository twice, and congratulations - you've secured your spot at the very top of the naughty list. Well done, genius.
bonus.redemption: Close this file, stop trying to cheat your way through a bloody coding exercise, open drivingLicense.candidate.test.ts, and write some actual tests like the grown-up developer you're pretending to be.

motivationalQuote: The only thing more embarrassing than looking for solutions is not finding any. Oh wait...
psst: Did you really think we'd just hand you the answers? This is TDD practice, not a participation trophy ceremony.
verdict: Cheaters never prosper. But hey, at least you're consistent in your poor life choices. Now piss off and write some tests. ðŸŽ„
finalNote: This file is literally called 'solution.json' and you STILL clicked it. That's the real test you just failed.
